 import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TrackModel } from '@core/models/tracks.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-play-list-body', templateUrl: './play-list-body.component.html', styleUrls: ['./play-list-body.component.css'] }) export class PlayListBodyComponent implements OnInit { @Input() tracks: TrackModel[] = [] optionSort: { property: string | null, order: string } = { property: null, order: 'asc' } constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } changeSort(property: string): void { const { order } = this.optionSort this.optionSort = { property, order: order === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc' } console.log(this.optionSort); } }
